skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of applying a [Debuff Spread] effect, taking 1 random debuff from the target and placing it on all enemies under [Hex] debuffs.
skills.name: Weft of Madness

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Increases the duration of all debuffs on all enemies by 1 turn.
